In general, the target document is identified by a URI. As we want to specify a set of properties about the document that might be helpful for assessing its provenance, we are introducing another entity - _SourceDocument_ - as in the following picture:

<b>Figure 2: Source Document metadata.</b>

=== Why foaf:Document is not good enough ===

Unfortunately, for content of the web it is common to have the same URI for several versions of a document. This is a problem when trying to use the foaf:Document class as the very same URI can identify different content along time. 

[http://annotation-ontology.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/images/Source%20Document%20-%20AO%20Annotation%20Ontology%20-%20by%20Paolo%20Ciccarese.png]<br/>

    </rdf:Description>
